## How to calculate subscales

### Return long format

```{r}

honos_long %>% 
  honos::calc_subscales(id_var = id, 
                        date_var = date, 
                        item_var = item, 
                        value_var = value, 
                        return_format = "long", 
                        return_items = TRUE)
```

### Return wide format

```{r}

honos_long %>% 
  honos::calc_subscales(id_var = id, 
                        date_var = date, 
                        item_var = item, 
                        value_var = value, 
                        return_format = "wide", 
                        return_items = FALSE)

```
